creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: layered collage consisting of old printed linoleum pieces that are torn, worn and layered; faux wood grain patterned pieces of linoleum with cowboy figure and cowboy boots in URQ and moving downward to right center and LRQ; waxy yellowed adhesive in URC and on upper right edge; layered linoleum pieces with floral designs in top center and in center, with yellow adhesive seeping from the edges; geometric patterned linoleum with gray, red and white lined pattern; muted mauve floral pattern on left edge; severely crackled blue and peach floral pattern in LLC; yellow stained backing paper visible in corners

title: Lesbian Dreams
